item.title: UN talks with rival leaders of Cyprus fail to reach deal on new border crossings
item.description: The United Nations chief says he would have liked more results from his meetings with the rival leaders of divided Cyprus

item.title: Ex-Philadelphia officer sentenced and immediately paroled after conviction in traffic stop shooting
item.description: A former Philadelphia police officer who shot and killed a motorist during a traffic stop is free after he was sentenced and granted parole by a judge
